alert.note: Alert for Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued December 26 at 8:54PM PST until December 27 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Freezing temperatures between 27 and 32 degrees Fahrenheit expected. * WHERE...Coos Bay, North Bend, Reedsport, and, generally, areas slightly inland from the immediate coast. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freezing conditions could damage or kill crops, other sensitive vegetation, and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Showers are expected to bring snow overnight into the morning to many areas. Below freezing temperatures are expected showers taper off in the morning. Beware of icy spots on walkways, patios, and other elevated surfaces. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast
